casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jose Miguel VENTURA. No. 343P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Arthur Donadio, Raleigh, for Ventura. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of July 2008 by Defendant to Join for Consideration (221P08 & 344P08):

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
